commit.message:
tree-ssa-pre.c (phi_translate): Use find_edge to find the index of a PHI argument.

	* tree-ssa-pre.c (phi_translate): Use find_edge to find the
	index of a PHI argument.

From-SVN: r91154

files.patch:

+	index of a PHI argument.
